Key Match Events: GOAL for Cape Verde, goal by Bebé at minute 32'
GOAL for Cape Verde, goal by Ryan Mendes at minute 51'
GOAL for Cape Verde, goal by Kevin Pina at minute 69'
Pre-Game Insights: Cape Verde throughout the Africa Cup 2024 has had a good performance, because after playing one match is located in the number one position in the standings of group B with three points
Mozambique is going through a bad moment talking about the Africa Cup 2024, because after playing a total of one match, they are placed in the third position of the group B standings with one point
Post-Match Reflections: Cape Verde won 3-0 at home over Mozambique, the goals came from Bebé at minute 32', Ryan Mendes at minute 51' and Kevin Pina at minute 69'.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match kicked off at Stade Félix Houphouët Boigny.
The referee for the match was Jean Jacques Ndala Ngambo.
Others: The match was part of the second day of group B of the Africa Cup 2024.
The match will be played at the Stade Félix Houphouët Boigny stadium in Abidjan, Ivory Coast.
